roleset.name: to send
roleset.note: DISPATCH-V NOTES: Frames file for 'dispatch' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. Comparison with 'send'. (from dispatch.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: dispatch-v: all arguments
example.text: Digital also said it has dispatched teams of technicians to California.

example.name: dispatch-v: transitive with adverbials
example.text: The company dispatched [*T*-2] as many as 200 people in the San Francisco area [0][*T*-3] to do the work, though most of the rerouting was done by computer.
example.arg: though most of the rerouting was done by computer

example.name: dispatch-v: transitive
example.text: The space shuttle Atlantis landed at a desert air strip at Edwards Air Force Base, Calif., ending a five-day mission that [*T*-1] dispatched the Jupiter-bound Galileo space probe.
